パンダくんの家出
Panda's Runaway
あれ？　パンダくん？
Huh? Panda-kun?
大荷物だね　おつかいかな？
That's a lot of luggage. Are you running an errand?
聞かないでください
Please don't ask.
いってらっしゃい
Take care.
それでさ　僕こう言ったわけよ
So then, I said this.
それもしかして座敷童子じゃないの？　って
"Could it be a Zashiki-warashi?"
それより　ペン子さんたちとは どうなったの？
By the way, what happened with Penko and the others?
その件は　ここにいる間だけ 忘れさせてくれない？
Could you let me forget about that while I'm here?
今は　座敷童子の話だけに 集中したいんだ
Right now, I just want to focus on the story about the Zashiki-warashi.
逃避行動だね
That's an avoidance tactic.
なんとでも言って
Say whatever you want.
入れない…
I can't get in...
どうしたの？　あの荷物
What's wrong? That luggage...
フリマ？
Flea market?
元気ないね　何かあったの？
You seem down. Did something happen?
お母さんが　いつも 僕のこと怒るんだ
My mom is always getting mad at me.
また　あなたは 昼間から　ゴロゴロして…
There you go again, lazing around in the middle of the day...
パンダがゴロゴロして　何が悪いの？
What's wrong with a panda lazing around?
まぁ　基本　ゴロゴロしてるもんね
"Well, basically, I'm always just lazing around."
僕から　ゴロゴロを奪ったら なんにも残らないよ？
If you take away my lounging around, there'll be nothing left of me, you know?
なんにも残らないんだ？
Nothing would be left?
逆に　すごいね
That's impressive, in a way.
お母さんは　きっと 僕が嫌いなんだ
My mom must really dislike me.
え～っと…　お母さんは　もっと　お手伝いして ほしいんじゃないの？
Um... maybe your mom just wants you to help out more?
でも　弟や　妹だって ゴロゴロしてるのに
But even my younger brother and sister laze around.
お母さん　怒らないんだよ？
Your mom doesn't get mad?
それは…　その子たちはまだ小さいからでしょ？
That's because they're still little, right?
弟や　妹は　かわいいけど 僕は違うからだよ
It's because my younger brother and sister are cute, but I'm not.
パンダなんて みんな　かわいいじゃない
Pandas are cute, aren't they?
これ　妹の写真
Here's a picture of my sister.
パンダでも違うんだね
Even pandas are different, huh?
うん
Yeah.
あっ…
Oh...
やっぱり　僕は 橋の下で拾われた子なんだ
I guess I really was a child found under a bridge.
橋の下で　パンダ拾えるなら
If you can find a panda under a bridge, then...
動物園が　みんな拾いに行くよ
If you could pick up a panda under a bridge, the zoo would go and pick them all up.
で　どうしたの？
So, what's wrong?
実は　家出してきたの
Actually, I ran away from home.
あ　やっぱり
Oh, I knew it.
それで　どこに行くの
So, where are you going?
橋の下？
Under the bridge?
え～っ　もうちょっと心配して 僕んちおいで　とか言ってよ
"What? At least show a little concern and say something like 'Come to my place.'"
言わないよ
I won't say that.
で　どこ行くの？
So, where are you going?
うんとね　ゴロゴロしてても何も言われなくて
Hmm, somewhere I can laze around without being told off.
黙っててもご飯が出てきて
Even if I stay silent, meals are served.
パンダくん　かわいいって 言ってくれる
Someone who will say "Panda-kun, you're cute."
誰かがいるところ
A place where someone is there.
それ　かなり限定されてるよね
That's pretty specific, isn't it?
あ～　リンリンのところは？
Ah, what about Linlin's place?
イヤだよ
No way.
もっと放っておいてほしいんだよ
"I just want to be left alone more."
だったら　動物園は？
Then how about the zoo?
住み込みでバイトすればいいでしょ
You could just work part-time while living there, right?
うわ～　パンダさん　かわいい！
Wow, the panda is so cute!
どうして毎日 働かないといけないの？
Why do I have to work every day?
僕　絶対に 毎日　働くのはイヤなんだよ
I absolutely don't want to work every day.
そんなに堂々と 言うことじゃないね
That's not something you should say so boldly.
あ！
Oh!
何？
What?
シロクマくん　あの荷物置いといていい？
Shirokuma-kun, is it okay to leave that luggage there?
えっ？
Huh?
家で　晩ご飯食べてくるよ
I'm going to eat dinner at home.
じゃあね
See you later.
帰るんだ
Heading home, huh?
いろんな家出があるんだね
There are all sorts of ways to leave home, aren't there?
こういうのは 家出って言わないでしょ
You wouldn't call this running away from home, would you?
パンダくん　まだ取りに来てないの家出の荷物
Panda-kun hasn't come to pick up his runaway luggage yet.
うん　昨日 晩ご飯食べに帰ったっきり
Yeah, since last night when I went back home for dinner.
家で寝たんだね
You slept at home, huh?
うん
Yeah.
家出の仕方間違ってない？
Aren't you doing the whole running away from home thing wrong?
家出の続きをしに来ました
I've come to continue my runaway.
あのさ　パンダくん
Hey, Panda.
お腹が空いたら 家に帰っちゃうんだとさ
I heard that when he gets hungry, he just goes back home.
家出というかさ
It's more like running away from home, you know.
何だろう…　日常生活？
I wonder... is this everyday life?
家には戻らないよ
I'm not going back home.
もう戻らないよ
I won't go back anymore.
いや　戻っていいんだよ
No, it's okay to go back.
何があったの？
What happened?
夕べ　また 大ショックなことがあったんだよ
Last night, something really shocking happened again.
来週は　あなたの お誕生日だけど
Next week is your birthday, though.
お母さんが ちょっと　忙しくてね
My mom is a bit busy, you see.
弟たちと一緒に 来月お祝いにするから…
We'll celebrate it next month with your younger brothers...
えっ！
Huh!
まぁ　大人の都合ってやつだね
Well, that's just how it is with adult circumstances.
ケーキが１個で済むとかさ
Like, we can get away with just one cake.
ケーキは　何個食べたって いいじゃない
It's okay to eat as many cakes as you want.
お祝いは　何回もあったほうが 楽しいのに
It's more fun to have celebrations multiple times.
どうして 減らそうとするんだろうね
I wonder why they try to cut back.
もう…　あんな家にはいられないよ
I can't stay in a house like that anymore...
まあ　まあ
There, there.
けど　どうしてパンダくんの誕生日じゃなくて
But why isn't it Panda-kun's birthday?
弟さんたちの誕生日に合わせるんですかね？
Why are you aligning it with your younger brothers' birthdays instead of Panda-kun's?
へえ～っ！
Wow!
かわいいでしょ
Isn't it cute?
ああ…　シロクマくん　ダメだよ！
Ah... Shirokuma-kun, that's not okay!
この　かわいい妹さんの写真をかわいくないパンダくんの前で褒めちゃ！
You shouldn't praise this cute picture of his sister in front of the not-so-cute Panda!
あ…　ごめん
Oh... sorry.
ま…　待とうよ　パンダくん
W-Wait, Panda-kun.
お祝いはしてくれるんだし
"They'll celebrate for me, after all."
１か月遅れでも　いいじゃない
It's okay even if it's a month late.
そこは　子供側も 妥協が必要じゃないかな？
Don't you think the kids should compromise a little there too?
よくないよ
It's not okay.
どうして？
Why not?
僕は　プレゼントに パンダかき氷機が欲しかったんだよ！
I wanted a panda-shaped shaved ice machine as a present!
ひと月後だと　もう　かき氷が 食べたくなくなっちゃうよ！
A month later, I won't want to eat shaved ice anymore!
え…　そんな理由？
Huh... for that reason?
僕　もう　ペンギンさんちの子になるよ
I'm going to become a member of the Penguin family now.
ちょっと！　勝手に 僕の戸籍に入ってこないで！
Wait a minute! Don't just add yourself to my family register without permission!
ペンギンさんは　僕のことかわいくないんだ…
Mr. Penguin doesn't think I'm cute...
そういう問題じゃないよね？
That's not the issue here, is it?
いいじゃないですか 置いてあげれば
"Why not just let him stay?"
えっ？　笹子さん！？
Huh? Sasako!?
何を言うんだい？
What are you talking about?
じゃあ　今から　笹子さんちか シロクマくんちの子になるよ
Then I'll become a member of either Sasako's or Shirokuma's family from now on.
それは　無理
That's impossible.
みんな　僕を 子供にするのは　イヤなんだ…
Everyone doesn't want to make me their child...
やっぱり　僕が かわいくないからなんだね…
It's because I'm not cute, isn't it...
そういうことでは ないんだけど…
That's not what I meant, though...
あっ　だったら
Oh, in that case...
僕たちが　今月 かき氷機を　プレゼントすれば？
What if we give them a shaved ice machine as a present this month?
かき氷パーティーしようよ
Let's have a shaved ice party!
本当？　いつ？　いつ？
Really? When? When?
今日が　ここ
Today, right here.
いつ？いつ？
When? When?
カフェが休みの日曜で…
On a Sunday when the café is closed...
あっ　来週は 町内会の用事があるんだった
Oh, I just remembered I have a neighborhood association meeting next week.
僕　再来週は法事でいないよ
I'll be away for a memorial service the week after next.
私も　親戚の結婚式で いないですね
I won't be around either because of a relative's wedding.
じゃあ…　あっ　来月になっちゃうね
Then... oh, it looks like it'll have to be next month.
こ…　今週末
Th... this weekend
土曜の午後なら　どう？
How about Saturday afternoon?
そうですね
Sounds good.
じゃあね
See you then.
僕　お家　帰る
I'm going home.
もう家出はいいんだ？
Have you given up on running away from home?
うん
Yeah.
荷物　持って帰ったら？
Why don't you take your stuff back home?
ああ　それね かき氷パーティーするなら必要だから
Oh, that? If we're having a shaved ice party, we'll need it.
うん？
Huh?
かき氷パーティーには これが　なくっちゃね
You can't have a shaved ice party without this, right?
やっぱり　家出の仕方 間違ってるよね？
I guess I'm going about running away from home the wrong way, huh?
楽しみだな　週末
I'm looking forward to the weekend.
今日は涼しいですね
It's cool today, isn't it?
かき氷パーティーは中止かな
I guess the shaved ice party is canceled.
だね
Yeah, it is.
うんうんうん……
Yeah, yeah, yeah...
やろう！　今すぐ　やろう！！
Let's do it! Let's do it right now!!
はい…
Okay...
いただきま～す！
Let's dig in!
やっぱり…
I knew it...
雨の日だと　おいしくないね
Food doesn't taste as good on rainy days, huh?
うん
Yeah
